TopicTitle: {AMRSD} Willys MB & BM-8-8 82mm rocket launcher variant "Jeep"

Articles.Content:
AMRSD is pleased to announce a new craft, for all your multi-purpose transport vehicles:

The Willys MB "Jeep"

![uwoBDg2.png](http://i.imgur.com/uwoBDg2.png)

![h9wJLew.png](http://i.imgur.com/h9wJLew.png)

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/n3pKf)

[Download Willys MB](http://kerbalx.com/Mad_Rocket_Scientist/AMRSD-Willys-MB)

And the armed variant, with a BM-8-8 82mm rocket launcher.

![qMW9rH4.png](http://i.imgur.com/qMW9rH4.png)

![OlGDMDt.png](http://i.imgur.com/OlGDMDt.png)

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/RoDmG)

(That's one of zekes' awesome tanks.)

[Download Willys MB-Armed](http://kerbalx.com/Mad_Rocket_Scientist/AMRSD-Willys-MB-Armed)

Okay, this craft use a new kind of suspension, which is inspired by Vagani's suspensions, it is customizable, to adjust it simply add or remove struts or fuel lines from the frame, wheels, and the spring, which is made out of radial ant engines, I have set it up in a way which like, but if you want to change it, here are some things to bear in mind:

Struts almost completely lock off the parts of suspension you used them on.

Fuel lines are very stretchy, but do make it stiffer.

And now, a challenge:

Break one of the non-spare wheels, without flipping the car.

Enjoy, and please post your pictures of off-roading here!

P.S.

You owe it to yourself to drive this thing down the broken runway.

![pjzXfkO.png](http://i.imgur.com/pjzXfkO.png)

Oho! I better arm mine and prepare for battle ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

This looks awesome, KSP won't load it though, says it's incompatible with this version of ksp (I have 1.0.3). Any ideas?

EDIT: Fixed it, if anyone else is having the same problem, just go into the craft file and right at the top change "1.0.4" to "1.0.3"
Or simply download the latest version. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
